data.text: N ma di, xa i i yɛtɛ taanixi i boore nde bɛ,
xa i i yɛtɛ raxɛtɛnxi i xa wɔyɛnyi nde ra,
n ma di, i xa fe birin naba i yɛtɛ raminide a kui,
I naxa xi de, na raba keren na.
I i yɛtɛ ratanga yi fe mɔɔli ma,
Tunnaxɔnɛ, siga dondoli yire.
Mangɛ mu na dondoli bɛ,
kɔnɔ a walima sogofure tɛmui,
I tan tunnaxɔnɛ, i i sama han mun tɛmui?
Xixɔli na i suxu, i na kinsɔn, i na i sa,
setareɲa fan fama nɛ i suxude tɛrɛnna ra,
Fuyante mu tinxin, a wule raɲɛrɛma a dɛ i nɛ.
A luma a ya magira ra,
Fe ɲaaxi na a xaxili kui,
Na kui kasarɛ fama nɛ a suxude,
Fe senni na Alatala naxee xɔnxi,
yɛtɛ igboe xa mixi mato ki,
bɔɲɛ naxan fe tinxintare maɲɔxunma,
seede naxan wule falama,
N ma di, i baba xa sɛriyɛ ragata,
E xa lu i bɔɲɛ kui tɛmui birin, e xiri i kɔn ma.
E i raɲɛrɛma nɛ i xa duniɲɛigiri kui,
Na sɛriyɛ findixi lanpui nan na,
E i ratangama ginɛ kobi ma,
I naxa wa na ginɛ xɔn ma a xa tofanyi ma,
Langoe ginɛ naxan mu na xɛmɛ taa, a mixi findima setare nan na,
Mixi nde nɔma tɛ tongode, a a sa a yuba kui,
Mixi nde nɔma a ɲɛrɛde tɛ wole tagi,
Na maniyama nɛ alɔ xɛmɛ naxan yabuma ginɛ xɛmɛ taa idɔxɔɛ ra.
Mixi mu yoma muɲɛti ma,
kɔnɔ a na suxu fo a xa muɲafe sare fi,
Kɔnɔ xaxilitare nan tun yɛnɛ rabama ginɛ ra.
A fe xɔrɔxɔɛ sɔtɔma nɛ yaagi kui,
barima tɔɔnɛ xɛmɛ bɔɲɛ ratema nɛ a ɲaaxi ra.
A bɔɲɛ mu goroma kɔbiri ra.
